citations.narrative:
An 8 week old brown lemur is currently housed in a crate that provides at least 2 square feet of floor space but only
measures 15 inches in height . The infant Lemur is held in this enclosure at least 10 -12 hours at night . Enclosures for
infant non human primates must provide at least 1.6 square feet of floor space and be a minimum of 20 inches tall. A
crate that meets at least minimum space requirement must be provided to the Lemur.
CORRECT BY : 8/18/2023

At time of the inspection , flies are an issue in the capybara enclosure. Several flies are swarming on and around the
capybara and on the pelleted food next to the animal. Flies may spread disease and can be a source of irritation and
cause distress to the animal. Currently , there is no method used to control flies in this exhibit. A safe and effective
program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be established and maintained.
CORRECT BY : 8/31/2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees.
n

narrative:
3.80(b)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
An 8 week old brown lemur is currently housed in a crate that provides at least 2 square feet of floor space but only 
measures 15 inches in height . The infant Lemur is held in this enclosure at least 10 -12 hours at night . Enclosures for 
infant non human primates must provide at least 1.6 square feet of floor space and be a minimum of 20 inches tall. A 
crate that meets at least minimum space requirement must be provided to the Lemur.  
CORRECT BY : 8/18/2023 
3.131(d) 
   
Sanitation. 
At time of the inspection , flies are an issue in the capybara enclosure. Several flies are swarming on and around the 
capybara and on the pelleted food next to the animal. Flies may spread disease and can be a source of irritation and 
cause distress to the animal. Currently , there is no method used to control flies in this exhibit. A safe and effective 
program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests shall be established and maintained. 
CORRECT BY : 8/31/2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility employees.
